name: Easy Dexter Lightbox
author: Chris McCoy

sections.description: Dexter is a simple and minimal Lightbox for WordPress, It takes minimal effort to implement this into your site.
sections.installation:
1. Activate the plugin through the admin panel on your site.
  2. Goto Settings -> Dexter and make any custom changes.
  3. Create a Gallery Like you Normally Would and the Lightbox will be applied to your gallery, or you can paste image urls, even imgur.com and cloudup.com image urls, and the lightbox will be applied to those as well, as well as clicking insert into post from the media manager
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Activate the plugin through the admin panel on your site.
  2. Goto Settings -> Dexter and make any custom changes.
  3. Create a Gallery Like you Normally Would and the Lightbox will be applied to your gallery, or you can paste image urls, even imgur.com and cloudup.com image urls, and the lightbox will be applied to those as well, as well as clicking insert into post from the media manager

How to report a bug?

Goto the Github Repo and Fill in an issue.

short_description: Easy Dexter Lightbox Plugin for WordPress
description: Dexter is a simple and minimal Lightbox for WordPress, It takes minimal effort to implement this into your site.
